Objective Title: define the statistical concepts odds and probability
Feedback: {"content":[{"children":[{"text":"Correct. The odds of an event will be the ratio of the probability that the event will occur to (1 - the probability that the event will occur). In this case, the probability of rolling an even number is 3/6. So, (1 - the probability of rolling an even number) is 1-(3/6)=(3/6). The odds of the event is (3/6)/(3/6). By simplifying, we can get the ratio 3:3. By simplifying more, we can get the ratio 1:1. Both 3:3 and 1:1 are valid ways of representing the odds of rolling an even number."}],"id":"2517522094","type":"p"}],"id":"376204094"}

Feedback: {"content":[{"children":[{"text":"Correct. The odds of an event will be the ratio of the probability that the event will occur to (1 - the probability that the event will occur). By simplifying, we can get the ratio 3:3. By simplifying more, we can get the ratio 1:1. Objective Title: define the statistical concepts odds and probability
Feedback: {"content":[{"children":[{"text":"Correct. The odds of an event will be the ratio of the probability that the event will occur to (1 - the probability that the event will occur). In this case, the probability of not rolling a 5 is 5/6. So, (1 - the probability that the event will occur) is 1-⅚=1/6. The odds of the event is (⅚)/(⅙). Another way to represent this is 5:1."}],"id":"3350987791","type":"p"}],"id":"2178973833"}

Feedback: {"content":[{"children":[{"text":"Correct. The odds of an event will be the ratio of the probability that the event will occur to (1 - the probability that the event will occur). In this case, the probability of Steph Curry making a free throw is 90.6% or 0.906. So, (1 - the probability of Steph Curry making a free throw) is 1-0.906=0.094. The odds of the event is 0.906:0.094. This is approximately equal to 0.9:0.1. This can be rewritten as 9:1."}],"id":"1765499729","type":"p"}],"id":"850766337"}

The odds of an event will be the ratio of the probability that the event will occur to (1 - the probability that the event will occur). In this case, the probability of not rolling a 5 is 5/6. So, (1 - the probability of not rolling a 5) is 1-⅚=⅙. The odds of the event is ⅚:⅙. Another way to represent this is 5:1."}],"id":"1076190179","type":"p"}],"id":"1488397788"}

Objective Title: define the statistical concepts odds and probability
Feedback: {"content":[{"children":[{"text":"Incorrect. 3:3 is the odds of not rolling an even number. While odds can be represented as a ratio with a colon “:”, probability can only be represented as a fraction, decimal, or percentage. The probability of an event occurring is the number of times the event can occur divided by the total number of possible outcomes. For a six-sided die, there are 6 total outcomes. There are 3 outcomes in which you do not roll an even number (1, 3, 5). So, the probability of not rolling an even number is 3/6. This can also be presented as the decimal 0.5."}],"id":"2936022153","type":"p"}],"id":"2708839384"}

Another way to represent this is 5:1."}],"id":"544736809","type":"p"}],"id":"1103841373"},"id":"3964711950","rule":"input like {2562771633}","score":0},{"feedback":{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"Incorrect"}],"id":"1841904288","type":"p"}],"id":"1983548670"},"id":"1617916262","rule":"input like {.*}","score":0}],"scoringStrategy":"average"}],"previewText":"If you roll a six-sided die, what are the odds in favor of not rolling a 5?","targeted":[[["2090593695"],"2530295999"],[["2090593695"],"2097292530"],[["2520903572"],"4145993348"],[["2562771633"],"3964711950"]],"transformations":[{"id":"1834044472","operation":"shuffle","path":"choices"}],"version":2},"bibrefs":[],"choices":[{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"5:1"}],"id":"3049516569","type":"p"}],"id":"2790701101"},{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"5/6"}],"id":"3102270675","type":"p"}],"id":"2178847183"},{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"0.8333"}],"id":"3781671127","type":"p"}],"id":"2090593695"},{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"83.33%"}],"id":"741879912","type":"p"}],"id":"2520903572"},{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"5/6, 0.8333, 83.33%"}],"id":"1441054310","type":"p"}],"id":"2562771633"}],"stem":{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"If you roll a six-sided die, what are the odds in favor of not rolling a 5?"}],"id":"1916462903","type":"p"}],"id":"2962816005"}}
